misuses.description: Insecure random number generation using a predictable seed
misuses.recommendation: Use a truly random seed or a secure random number generator

misuses.description: The SecureRandom class provides a secure source of randomness, but it must be used correctly. The setSeed() method should only be used with a truly random seed. Using a predictable seed can lead to exploitable weaknesses in the cryptographic system.
misuses.recommendation: Use a truly random seed or a secure random number generator
